original_text: In the year that King Ahaz died, God showed this message to Isaiah: In the year that King Ahaz died, God showed this message to Isaiah: In the year that King Ahaz died, God showed this message to Isaiah: In the year that King Ahaz died, God showed this message to Isaiah:
korean_text: 아하스 왕이 죽던 해에 받은 이 경고가 임하니라
